channel.title: Binary Birds
channel.description: Server-side Swift development and consulting. Secure, efficient, scalable solutions.

item.title: Beginner's guide to Swift macros
item.description: Learn how to create and publish your very first macro using SPM and the brand new Macro APIs introduced in Swift 5.9.

item.title: How to write OpenAPI specs using Swift and OpenAPIKit?
item.description: In this tutorial I'll show you how to build OpenAPI 3.0+ specifications efficiently using Swift & OpenAPIKit.

item.title: Sending push notifications using server side Swift in 2023
item.description: Learn how to send push notifications with Swift on the server side using the Google FCM API and the APN Swift library.

item.title: Static site geneneration with the power of Swift and Toucan
item.description: Toucan is a lightweight static site generator written in Swift. This article will guide you through the process of creating your own website using it.
